resources.string: Guide to Create Airline:\n 1. Simply type in the name of the airline\n 2. If the airline name already exists, a new airline will not be created

Guide to Create Flight:
 1. Type in the airline name - any airline name not in system will be created
 2. Flight number is restricted to 4 numerical digits
 3. Departure and Arrival airport IATA codes are strictly 3 characters and must be a valid IATA code
 4. Departure Date & Time and Arrival Date & Time are in the same timezone
 5. Departure Date & Time must not come after Arrival Date & Time

Guide to View Airlines:
 1. Create Airlines before using View Airlines function
 2. On the page, tap the airline name to see the airline's flights (see #5)
 3. A search bar on the bottom can be used to filter by airline name
 4. Scroll down to view more available airlines
 5. On the airline's flight list, scroll down to view more available flights
 6. Two search bars are on the bottom, the left for departure IATA code, the right for arrival IATA code

# Airline-Android Project
 Is an Airline Flight Management System - An Android Application
 An Android application that allows for airlines and flights to be created, stored and viewed.
 ## Getting Started
 These instructions will help you run the program on your local machine for testing and development purposes.
 ### Prerequisites
 - Java 8 or later
 - Android API 33 or later
 ### Installing
 - Clone the repository to your local machine
 - Download Android Studio
 - Open the application in Android Studio
 - Create an android emulator with Android API 33 to view the app
 ## Usage
 Guide to View Airlines:
 1. Create Airlines before using View Airlines function
 2. On the page, tap the airline name to see the airline's flights (see #5)
 3. A search bar on the bottom can be used to filter by airline name
 4. Scroll down to view more available airlines
 5. On the airline's flight list, scroll down to view more available flights
 6. Two search bars are on the bottom, the left for departure IATA code, the right for arrival IATA code
 Guide to Create Airline:
 1. Simply type in the name of the airline
 2. If the airline name already exists, a new airline will not be created
 Guide to Create Flight:
 1. Type in the airline name - any airline name not in system will be created
 2. Flight number is restricted to 4 numerical digits
 3. Departure and Arrival airport IATA codes are strictly 3 characters and must be a valid IATA code
 4. Departure Date & Time and Arrival Date & Time are in the same timezone
 5. Departure Date & Time must not come after Arrival Date & Time
 ## Built With
 Java 8
 Android API 33
 Pixel 5 API 33 Emulator
 ASUS Zenfone 6 API 31
 ## Contributing
 Professor David Whitlock for the Airline helper source files:
 https://github.com/DavidWhitlock/PortlandStateJavaGettingStarted
